TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtensibleDataObject

summary.span: 提供資料結構，以便儲存 在還原序列化標記有 屬性的型別時所遇到的額外資料。

span.span: Provides a data structure to store extra data encountered by the during deserialization of a type marked with the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會提供單一屬性，這個屬性可設定或傳回用來儲存資料合約外部資料的結構。The interface provides a single property that sets or returns a structure used to store data that is external to a data contract. 額外資料會儲存在 類別的執行個體，並且會透過 屬性來存取。The extra data is stored in an instance of the class and accessed through the property. 透過資料進行接收、處理以及傳回的來回作業，額外資料會原封不動地傳回原始的傳送者。In a roundtrip operation where data is received, processed, and sent back, the extra data is sent back to the original sender intact. 這種方式可以用來儲存接收自合約未來版本的資料。This is useful to store data received from future versions of the contract. 如果您不實作這個介面，任何額外的資料都會在來回作業期間遭到忽略並且捨棄。If you do not implement the interface, any extra data is ignored and discarded during a roundtrip operation. ### 為了使用這個版本控制功能，此時要To use this versioning feature 1. 在類別中實作 介面。Implement the interface in a class. 2. 將 屬性新增至型別。Add the property to your type. 3. 將 型別的私用成員新增至類別。Add a private member of type to the class. 4. 使用新的私用成員來實作屬性的取得與設定方法。Implement get and set methods for the property using the new private member. 5. 將 屬性套用至該類別。Apply the attribute to the class. 將 和 屬性設定為適當的值 (如有必要)。Set the and properties to appropriate values if necessary. 型別的版本設定的相關資訊，請參閱[資料合約版本控制](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-versioning.md)。For more information about versioning of types, see [Data Contract Versioning](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-versioning.md). 如需建立向前相容資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[向前相容資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/forward-compatible-data-contracts.md)。For information about creating forward-compatible data contracts, see [Forward-Compatible Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/forward-compatible-data-contracts.md). 如需有關資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範型別的執行個體 (`PersonVersion2`)，它是可序列化型別的第二個版本 (`Person`)。The following code shows an instance of a type (`PersonVersion2`) that is the second version of a serializable type (`Person`). 第二個版本包含第一個版本沒有呈現的額外資料 (`ID` 欄位)。The second version contains extra data (`ID` field) that is not present in the first version. [!code-csharp[IUnknownSerializationData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iunknownserializationdata/cs/iunknownserialization.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IUnknownSerializationData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/iunknownserializationdata/vb/iunknownserialization.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Runtime::Serialization::ExtensionDataObject ^ ExtensionData { System::Runtime::Serialization::ExtensionDataObject ^ get(); void set(System::Runtime::Serialization::ExtensionDataObject ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定包含額外資料的結構。

span.span: Gets or sets the structure that contains extra data.

value.span: ，其中包含不會辨識成屬於資料合約的資料。

span.span: An that contains data that is not recognized as belonging to the data contract.
